commit message:
Fixes potential ANR while searching for radios.

Introduced a private helper class for performing radio search
in the background thread(RadioSearchDialog). This change also
prevents a StrictMode violation. Existing wording is reused.

Be prepared for incorrect format of RSS enclosures.

Looks like it happens to be incorrect from time to time.
Changed minSdkVersion to 9 to correctly build with Equalizer API.
Fixes Equalizer crash on ICS+ platforms.
Fixed mdpi player layout - wrong action triggered on Equalizer button.

Merge pull request #25 from isdes/rss-fix

Be prepared for incorrect format of RSS enclosures.

Merge pull request #27 from isdes/anrs

Fixes potential ANR while searching for radios.

Handling resuming from pause.

Apparently applying equalizer settings when we are performing
a resume from pause state is not supported by the framework.
Since I see no way of determining this fact in PlayerEngineImpl.play()
let's just ignore this.

Fixes preset naming.

Removes current hard-coded preset names with names dynamically
obtained from Equalizer. Tests prove that presets are rather
device specific (to either vendor or particular hw platform).

Merge pull request #26 from isdes/equalizer

Equalizer on ICS/JB
